detail_desc: Short blouse in patterned viscose crêpe with a V-neck, seam under the bust and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck and ties at the hem.
Sleeveless body in jersey with a print motif on the front, a deep neckline front and back, and press-studs at the crotch.
Basketball-inspired sports vest top in fast-drying, breathable mesh with a print motif on the front and inset panels at the sides.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Earrings in metal and acetate. Two pairs of larger hoops and two pairs with pendants. Length 4.5-6 cm.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Heart-shaped metal earrings decorated with resin beads. Length 4 cm.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a frill-trimmed grandad collar and button placket with a frilled trim. Gathered yoke at the back and gathered seams at the shoulders. Seam and a detachable tie belt under the bust, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Satin tie. Width 6.5 cm. The polyester content of the tie is partly recycled.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft, pima cotton jersey with extra-long sleeves.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a grandad collar with a visible button. Concealed buttons down the front, a flounced button band, long sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Two pairs of treggings in stretch corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Skirt in patterned chiffon with wide smocking at the waist and two tiers. Partly lined.
Dress in patterned modal crêpe with buttons at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow, and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
Top in soft, printed jersey made from a viscose blend with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves with smocking and a flounce.
Leather Derby shoes with open lacing, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Pyjamas with a jersey T-shirt top and woven shorts. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with sparkly stones and a sewn-in turned-up hem.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Blouse in a broderie anglaise cotton weave with a stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Lined with a V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a ribbed polo neck, short raglan sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem.
Leggings in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative buttons at the front.
Metal and plastic keyring with a padded faux fur heart, carabiner hook and decorative charms. Length 16 cm.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Treggings in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Jacket in sturdy, washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud, side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned, raw-edge cuffs and a rounded, raw-edge hem.
Push-up triangle bikini top with frills at the front and padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Top in sturdy crêpe jersey with a stand-up collar, long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs and pleats at the waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Calf-length dress in jacquard-patterned jersey containing metal threads with a ribbed trim around the neckline and long sleeves.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Calf-length jumpsuit in soft slub cotton jersey with concealed press-studs at the back of the neck, a flounce in a broderie anglaise weave over each shoulder, and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. An extended, rounded hem in woven fabric with decorative buttons.
Top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a deep neckline at the front and a broderie anglaise frill around the armholes. Gathers in the sides for best fit.

Backpack in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede front. Handle and zip at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps,a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 11x22x31 cm.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Top in soft jersey with an interactive motif. Narrow trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Two-piece set in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with lapped shoulders and long sleeves. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a gathered skirt.
Cardboard photo booth masks in various designs with a plastic stick.

Shirt woven in a cotton blend with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with mesh inside. High collar, a hood with an elastic drawstring, and zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front. Yoke at the back, flap chest pockets and zipped side pockets. Long sleeves with an adjustable tab and hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, ventilating holes with metal eyelets under the arms, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Loose-fitting trousers in soft fleece with covered elastication at the waist and hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with sequins on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist with an extended waistband and hook-and-eye fastening. Zip fly, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket joggers in stretch, supersoft denim. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, a fake fly, low crotch and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Earrings with plastic beads and tassels. Length 8.5 cm.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake side pockets.
Straight-cut blouse in a patterned cotton weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Half-length sleeves with slits and ties, and a straight-cut hem.
Short blouse in a patterned weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Short sleeves with scalloped edges, and ties at the front of the hem.
Short skater skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back that has a rubber print and ventilating hole pattern.
Short-sleeved wrapover top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, hook-and-eye fastener at the top, narrow elasticated seam at the waist and sewn-in tie at the side.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a metal fastening at the front.
Fine-knit hat with a pompom on top, a turned-up hem with a text motif, and a detachable pile beard.
Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, side pockets and a jersey trim around the pockets, cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Bras in microfibre with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave with smocking at the top and long sleeves with two, bell-shaped flounces. Seam at the hem with a narrow frill and gently flared peplum. Unlined.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Wedge-heel ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved nursing top in soft jersey with a wrapover front and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a small, frilled collar, concealed buttons down the front, short puff sleeves and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Hairband in cotton jersey with a bow at the front and elastication at the back.
Long cardigan in washed cotton jersey with a hood and draped lapels. Welt side pockets, no fasteners and raw edges.
Sandals in imitation leather with crossover foot straps. Linings and lightly padded insoles in imitation leather, and fluted soles.
Bikini top with a decorative ring at the front, removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Velour scrunchie with a bow
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.

Sports trousers in fabric with a slight sheen. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
